name: Sundowners
description:
Sundowners is a rogue-like, wave-based, action horror game where you've only got one bullet, one health, one life and one gun to fend off the encroaching hordes.

Fend off waves of blood crazed vampires as you dart between their bodies to refill your scarce--zero--ammo reserves.

Bob, weave, and dive through hails of gunfire with your ability to slow down time.

Track and flank your attackers by tracing the sounds of their footsteps through your house.

Just remember to always be alert and aware because one mistake could spell your demise!

Sundowners was made in just under 48 hours for the GMTK 2019 game jam.
